content: I am a third-year Ph. D student in the LITIS Lab at INSA Rouen Normandy, under the supervision of Romain Hérault and the direction of Gilles Gasso. I am interested in deep learning and deep generative models, especially in the conditioning of generative adversarial networks.
summary: I am a third-year Ph. D student in the LITIS Lab at INSA Rouen Normandy, under the supervision of Romain Hérault and the direction of Gilles Gasso. I am interested in deep learning and deep generative models, especially in the conditioning of generative adversarial networks.
title: Cyprien Ruffino

summary: We address the task of learning effective generative adversarial networks when only very few pixel values are known beforehand.
title: Pixel-wise Conditioned Generative Adversarial Networks for Image Synthesis and Completion

content: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.
summary: We investigate adding  a  regularization  term to  the  conditioning  of  GANs  to  deal  with  cases  where  a  small  subset  of the  image  is  known  beforehand.
title: Pixel-wise Conditioning of Generative Adversarial Networks

summary: We investigate adding  a  regularization  term to  the  conditioning  of  GANs  to  deal  with  cases  where  a  small  subset  of the  image  is  known  beforehand.
title: Dilated Spatial Generative Adversarial Networks for Ergodic Image Generation
